Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>さん…… またさっき、何か飲んでました……？
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>... Were you drinking again just now?

Entry.JapaneseText: 飲んでたけど……お酒じゃないわよ。 スールズ名物の牛乳よ。あなたもどう？
Entry.EnglishText: I was drinking...but it wasn't sake. It was Sulz's legendary milk. Would you like to try some?

Entry.JapaneseText: え、えっと、わたし…… 牛乳は苦手で……
そんな事言ってたら、大きくなれないわよ。 <Mao>みたいにチビッコのままでいいの？
Entry.EnglishText: You won't get any taller with an attitude like that. Do you wish to remain itty-bitty like <Mao>?

Entry.JapaneseText: だからー！ ボクは今が成長期なの！
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, come on! I'm going through a growth spurt right now!
